meanings.definition: The act of creating a montage.
meanings.sent1: Montaging can help tell a story through pictures.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy looking at the montaging in this photo album.
meanings.sent3: The montaging of family photos made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her montaging of memories was like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The montaging of old and new photos brought back fond memories.

meanings.definition: The process of combining different elements into a single artistic work.
meanings.sent1: The artist's montaging of colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the montaging of music and visuals in this film.
meanings.sent3: The montaging of flavors in the dish was surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her montaging of emotions in the play was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The montaging of textures in the sculpture was impressive.

meanings.definition: To assemble or edit a series of images or clips into a cohesive whole.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours montaging the photos for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: Montaging the scenes together made the movie flow seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: He was montaging the clips with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: Montaging the footage felt like putting together a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The director was montaging the shots to create a powerful sequence.
